label: Extra Small
description: Configuration change or trivial fix with no logic change
examples: Change button color; Update text copy; Fix typo in validation message

label: Small
description: Small self-contained feature or fix with minimal dependencies
examples: Add form validation; Create a static page; Add a new API field

label: Medium
description: Feature requiring multiple files or components with moderate logic
examples: User login flow; CRUD for a resource; Search with filters

label: Large
description: Complex feature spanning multiple layers with significant logic
examples: Payment integration; Real-time notifications; Role-based access control

label: Extra Large
description: Epic-level work that should be broken down further
examples: Full authentication system; Multi-tenant support; Data migration pipeline
